name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.client.socketcache.expiryMsec
description: Socket cache expiration for short-circuit reads in msec.

name: mapreduce.jobhistory.move.interval-ms
description:
Scan for history files to more from intermediate done dir to done
  dir at this frequency.

name: ipc.client.connect.timeout
description:
Indicates the number of milliseconds a client will wait for the
               socket to establish a server connection.

name: mapreduce.input.lineinputformat.linespermap
description:
When using NLineInputFormat, the number of lines of input data
  to include in each split.

name: yarn.app.mapreduce.am.job.committer.cancel-timeout
description:
The amount of time in milliseconds to wait for the output
    committer to cancel an operation if the job is killed

name: mapreduce.job.max.split.locations
description:
The max number of block locations to store for each split for
    locality calculation.

name: hadoop.security.crypto.buffer.size
description: The buffer size used by CryptoInputStream and CryptoOutputStream.
